Articles.Content:
Just like in Danny2462's Having Fun in The Solar System, you forgot a ladder.

 

I send a probe into the Sun.

But you mess everything up and your probe is slingshot out of the system at 90 km/s.

A mission to hit Kerbin at the 0.5 C..

You run out of money trying to stack fuel tanks.

A mission to get a kerbal from the launch pad to the runway at the KSC.

The Kerbal stumbles, spaghettifies, and crashes into the ground at high speed.

I send a mission to Sarnus using a Jool slingshot.

The Maneuver Node System fails you and you burn up in Jools atmo.

I fire a missile to the Mun with a Nuclear Pulse Rocket.

Well, isn't it obvious what happens?

I create nothing.
A tear in the space-time continum is created, acting as a black hole, but also consuming time. The universe ends.

It explodes even though you made nothing.

I send a mission to Voon.

You and everyone else around you suddenly lose all knowledge of Voon, and your mission is thought to be the work of an extraterrestrial intelligence.

 

I land on Tylo with NERV clusters.

The tanks overheat and explode.

I send an orbiter to either Mun or Minmus.

Sadly, it misses both of them.

 

I send a probe to Eve.

You realize you forgot engines and it only makes a flyby.

I try to impact Moho with a probe.
But KrakenPhsyics looks upon your vessel and decides to let you explore deep space forcibly. A.K.A It slingshots you out of KSP and smacks you in the face through your screen.

No mission so mine!

A mission to blow up the Inland Space Centre with hydrogen bombs.

7 hours ago, KerbalOmmex said:

No mission so mine!

A mission to blow up the Inland Space Centre with hydrogen bombs.

Bombmites discover your warhead and eat all your charges, creating a dud.

A mission to verify gravity, build a rocket (the payload is the omnipotent space-time stabilizer) with a beam attached from the bottom the rocket engine node, falls over and fuel tank explodes.

Am I needed here or no?

 

I make a successful mission, the game shuts down okay, and my computer experiences no ill effects.

However, I steal your computer.

 

I launch a Kerbal into the Sun.

26 minutes ago, Omegagoldfish said:

However, I steal your computer.

 

I launch a Kerbal into the Sun. 

kerbal cannot read greek gets confused and steers into moho.

I tell the kraken where your kerbal fell, he smacks his lips and gulps, from his burb we hear 'i am the omega'. 

 

Edited May 31, 2016 by PB666

I'm not sure that's a space mission, but: The Kraken is shape-blind, so he confuses Moho with Bop and eventually dies there.

I'm sending a scanner to Minmus with electricity and comms for SCIENCE!

6 hours ago, spacebrick3 said:

I'm not sure that's a space mission, but: The Kraken is shape-blind, so he confuses Moho with Bop and eventually dies there.

I'm sending a scanner to Minmus with electricity and comms for SCIENCE!

Hit by an EMP and goes off course striking an fortuitous asteroid passing close to Minmus.

Mission is to test new flame retardant spacesuit for Clabdirt Kerman by tying him to the launchpad during the "flea" liftoff with a battery and octocore on top.

Well, the suit keeps flames out but not heat so he dies.

I send a probe into Neptune to send back pictures.

4 hours ago, cubinator said:

Well, the suit keeps flames out but not heat so he dies.

I send a probe into Neptune to send back pictures.

It turned out to be a Ford probe was found on the road dead. 

Sent a tow truck out to pick up the probe.

The tow truck accidentally went too close to Saturn and doesn't have enough delta-V to slow down around Neptune.

I send a mission to catch up to the tow truck (now escaping the solar system) and put it in a bag to bring it back to Earth.

2 hours ago, cubinator said:

The tow truck accidentally went too close to Saturn and doesn't have enough delta-V to slow down around Neptune.

I send a mission to catch up to the tow truck (now escaping the solar system) and put it in a bag to bring it back to Earth.

bag intercepted by an ole lady and placed in a shopping cart wandering hopelessly around Kerbol syatem. 

Mission, put a mech jeb unit on the shopping cart.

On 6/1/2016 at 8:25 PM, PB666 said:

bag intercepted by an ole lady and placed in a shopping cart wandering hopelessly around Kerbol syatem. 

Mission, put a mech jeb unit on the shopping cart. 

 

The old lady smashes the mechjeb unit with her purse.

I send a mission to Pluron and Khato.
